name: Palace P3 Chain Puff Crew Navy
description: Navy crew neck sweatshirt with puff printed artwork. 400gsm brushback sweat with ribbed cuff and hem. 74% Cotton, 26% Polyester.

name: Aime Leon Dore Unisphere Cap
description: Botanical green 5-panel cap with embroidered Unisphere logo. Adjustable snapback. 100% Cotton. Hand wash. Made in China.

name: Kith Women Lucy Cropped Long Sleeve II Tee
description: White cropped long sleeve tee with Kith embroidery. 190 GSM cotton jersey fabric with 1x1 ribbed neckline and cuffs. 100% Cotton.

name: Salomon XT-6 Sneakers
description: Unisex ultra-distance running sneakers with quickLACE system, Mud contaGRIP outsole, and EVA cushioning. Originally launched in 2013 for world-class athletes.
